DIRECTORY OF CHINESE OFFICIALS: PROVINCIAL ORGANIZATIONS

Document Type: 
CREST
Collection: 
General CIA Records
Document Number (FOIA) /ESDN (CREST): 
CIA-RDP86S00596R000200660001-6

RIFPUB

K

328

December 22, 2016

February 17, 2011

1

Publication Date: 
October 1, 1984

Body: 
Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Directorate of Intelligence Directory of Chinese Officials: Provincial Organizations CR 84-15174 (Supersedes CR 83-13364) October 1984 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 This publication is prepared for the use of US Government officials, and the format, coverage, and content are designed to meet their specific requirements. US Government officials may obtain additional copies of this document directly or through liaison channels from the Central Intelligence Agency. Requesters outside the US Government may obtain subscriptions to CIA publications similar to this one by addressing inquiries to: Document Expediting (DOCEX) Project Exchange and Gift Division Library of Congress Washington, D.C. 20540 or: National Technical Information Service 5285 Port Royal Road Springfield, VA 22161 Requesters outside the US Government not interested in subscription service may purchase specific publications either in paper copy or microform from: National Technical Information Service 5285 Port Royal Road Springfield, VA 22161 (To expedite service call the NTIS Order Desk (703) 487-4650) or: Photoduplication Service Library of Congress Washington, D.C. 20540 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Directorate of Intelligence Directory of Chinese Officials: Provincial Organizations Information available as of 31 October 1984 was used in the preparation of this publication. CR 84-15174 (Supersedes CR 83-13364) October 1984 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 PREFACE The Directory of Chinese Officials: Provincial Organizations identifies individuals who hold positions on the provincial level in the Chinese Commu- nist Party (CCP), legislatures, governments, and selected mass organizations. It also identifies those who hold posts in military regions and military district headquarters and in the CCP and government organizations of the provincial capitals. The early and late dates denote specific identification of an individual in his position. Early dates are current up to 31 October 1984; late dates are current up to 5 October 1984. The names of members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the CCP are followed by Mbr, CC, and Alt Mbr, CC, respectively. Members of the Central Advisory Commission are denoted by Mbr, CAC. The directory may be used to find both the incumbents in given positions within an organization and the positions of specific individuals. Also included are an organization index and an alphabetical index of personalities, with Standard Telegraphic Codes when available. This is the third published directory of Chinese provincial-level officials. (Other volumes in the Directory of Chinese Officials series are National Level Organizations and Scientific and Educational Organizations.) The orthogra- phy adopted is the Pinyin system for the romanization of Chinese characters. When romanized versions of Uygur, Zang and other minority names are known, they are used; otherwise the Chinese phonetics of those names are rendered in Pinyin. Beneath the names of most of the major organizations are short notes that give the date of their establishment. Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 Approved For Release 2011/02/17: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200660001-6 TABLE OF CONTENTS Page iii .................................................................................................................................... 1.
